ee harunu wita aasaditha pudgalayakuge rudhiraya ho pataka ho wenath kenakuge sharira abhyantharikaranaya kirima ho wima, aasaditha pudgalayaku bhawithayata gath ennath katu, sirinjara saha anekuth aakarawala shalya upakarana, nirogi pudgalayaku bhawithayata ganima yana awasthawaladith ech.ayi.wi. aasadanaya we. ech.ayi.wi. aasaditha mawak daruwaku darimedith, ee daruwata mawu kiri dimedith daruwata ech.ayi.wi. aasadanaya wime hakiyawak atha. 2015 wasaredi nikuth karana lada warthawala dakwena aakarayata, mawagen daruwata ech.ayi.wi. sampreishanaya wima ihalama mattamaka thibenne kiyuba rajya thula ya. ech.ayi.wi. aasadithayan men ma eeds rogaya walandunu ayath samajayen konwima samanya siddhiyaki.

shri lankawata parlimenthu aandukramaya handunwa denu labimen pasu awadhiyehi ada dakwa ma shri lankawe deshapalana balaya huwamaru wi aththe bandaranayaka wisin nirmanaya karana lada shri lanka nidahas pakshaya (1951) saha ema aandukramaya yatathe balaya dinagath ohu da niyojanaya wu palamu deshapalana pakshaya wana eksath jathika pakshaya athara ho eseth nathnam ema maha deshapalana paksha deka kendragathawa nirmanaya kerunu deshapalana sandhana atharaya. 1936 di thamage nayakathwayen aarambha kerunu 'sinhala maha sabhawa' niyojanaya karamin 1947 di eksath jathika pakshaya nirmanaya kirimata dayaka wu solaman west rijwe dayas bandaranayakage deshapalana gaman margaya thula pawathi deshapalana wisanwadaya ohu itha keti kalayak athulatha ema pakshayen iwathwa wenath deshapalana gamanakata mula pirimata hethu wu athara shri lanka nidahas pakshaya (1951) ehi eelanga diguwa wini.
